name: Luminary Garden
description:
Tend to your garden out in space, as you collect and plant seeds, growing the world around you. However, some creatures are trapped on the neighbouring islands. Will you be able to rescue them?

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move

Q & E or mouse wheel to switch between inventory slots

Mouse click to plant seeds

Hint: Try growing a clump of tiles close together. Something might happen!

The Team
